Package org.Game2D.engine.chunks

Class FinderHash

java.lang.Object
org.Game2D.engine.chunks.FinderHash
public class FinderHash extends Object
Dark Magic for quickly identifying Chunks by their coordinates and finding nearby Chunks

      Returns:

    • getAdjacentChunk

      public Chunk getAdjacentChunk(Chunk chunk, Directions direction)
      Returns the Chunk in the specified direction from the specified origin Chunk If the specified direction does not match any known directions, return null
      Parameters:
      chunk - Origin Chunk
      direction - Direction from the origin Chunk
      Returns:
      Chunk in that direction
